original_text: One day Cain said to his brother Abel, ‘We should go out to the fields.’ While they were in the fields, Cain attacked his brother Abel. He killed Abel.
korean_text: 가인이 그의 아우 아벨에게 말하고 그들이 들에 있을 때에 가인이 그의 아우 아벨을 쳐죽이니라

sentences.original_text: One day Cain said to his brother Abel
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 가인이 자기 동생 아벨에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: 'We should go out to the fields.'
While they were in the fields
